title: How to use the Change Calendar
content:
If you have the appropriate permissions, you can use the Change Calendar to work on scheduling of changes.

From the main menu, select Build > Change > Calendar.

The Change Calendar is displayed.

Note The Change Calendar recognizes and enforces change workflow rules. For example, changes must be scheduled to occur after the current time. If you breach the rules, the change representation displays in red, and a Health Indicator icon appears, displaying the number of validation error messages. Click the icon to view the messages.

The calendar also recognizes the following restrictions about change schedules:

  • Changes should be scheduled to occur in a maintenance time period (or "window")
  • Changes should not be scheduled to occur in a blackout period

If you breach either or both of these restrictions, a warning icon is displayed.

You can do the following tasks in the Change Calendar:

  • Deal with an unscheduled change
  • Reschedule a change
  • Reschedule downtime for a change
  • Deal with a change outside a maintenance window
